word: I am afraid we have altogether too cheap and common ideas. "Behold, the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain thee" (1 Kings 8:27). Let not anyone venture to limit the power of the Holy One of Israel. There are conjectures and questions in regard to God's work--"Put off thy shoes from off thy feet, for the place whereon thou standest is holy ground" (Exodus 3:5). . . .
